casebody.data:
James THOMAS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 8, 2019

Freesia Singngam Waldron, deputy assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Walker, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner James Thomas' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 902, 202 A.3d 1123 (AC 40940), is denied.
